product_name: E-Case iSeries Case with Jack - iPod/iPhone 4
long_description: The E-Case iSeries case with jack seals your sensitive iPod or iPhone 4th generation in reliable protection from moisture when you're out in wet weather or enjoying the water. External, 4-pole headphone jack is watertight and maintains full device functionality. Tough, completely transparent polyurethane windows are soft enough to let you view and use the touchscreen without removing device from the case. PVC-free polyurethane material resists UV damage, so it remains transparent. SealLock(TM) closure helps ensure waterproof performance down to 3 feet for 30 minutes. E-Case iSeries case with jack attaches to a kayak deck or pack straps using cords or clips (not included) and 2 corner lash points.
short_description: The E-Case iSeries case with jack seals your sensitive iPod or iPhone 4th generation in reliable protection from moisture when you're out in wet weather or enjoying the water.
